originalText.text: We had an absolutely marvelous experience with immersion journeys. We stayed in three camps in the Serengeti and the amazing  Ngorongoro crater where in a silvery light, we saw baboons flamingos zebras wallabees impalas,all kinds of antelopes,  lions, black rhinos, a hippo, velvet monkeys, all kinds of birds. In the Serengeti, we saw the migration of huge numbers, of wallabies and zebras . We saw more lions, giraffes, a cheetah   a leopard hanging out in a tree eating an antelope. We saw so many amazing things, and met so many kind people. The trip was well paced, and everywhere we landed, we were met and escorted by wonderful guides.  We went in January and the weather was both hotter and colder than I expected. A trip of a lifetime!

originalText.text: My family and I used Immersion Journey to travel to Tanzania. We loved the company! They set us up with incredible hotels and our safari experience was one of my favorite thing i've ever experienced. We not only saw beautiful animals, but the travel agency ensured we had quality meals throughout our trip. We had Rumit Mehta as our travel agent and he was incredibly helpful, patient, and always responded to our needs. He also reached out while we were traveling and when we returned home to make sure we were okay. Thank you Immersion Journeys!

originalText.text: An amazing trip. Well planned and organized. Much more than I expected.  Made every activity look easy. Carefully Curated!!! The Tour Manager - Belinda was the absolute best!!!Her personality, her knowledge, her  patience, her organizational skills was simply phenomenal. I can’t speak enough about the ease of traveling within the country, the impeccable hotels, the venues, the activities - all well done!!  I am ready for the next adventure with Inmersión Journeys AND most of all with BELINDA as our Tour Manager. Thanks for making this trip happen. It was worth every dollar spent. Thank you.

originalText.text: Rumit and his team at Immersion Journeys were amazing from start to finish and follow-up on return from our trip to South Africa. Everything was executed to perfection and fit our wants to a tee. Tremendous support on the ground with the team and with Rumit personally throughout our two week adventure. We definitely recommend Immersion Journeys and plan to book with them again in the future.

text.text: Rumit and his team at Immersion Journeys were amazing from start to finish and follow-up on return from our trip to South Africa. Everything was executed to perfection and fit our wants to a tee. Tremendous support on the ground with the team and with Rumit personally throughout our two week adventure. We definitely recommend Immersion Journeys and plan to book with them again in the future.

originalText.text: Wow! We had a fantastic trip to South Africa! Couldn’t be happier with the service from Rumit and Immersion Journeys. We had a couple of unexpected bumps along the way and we felt the team was always available and quick to respond and resolve whatever issue we were having. Wonderful service that we will be recommending and using in the future, Thanks!
